New Records: Aaron Civale and Aaron Ashby combined on a two-hit shutout
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio drove in two runs
Contreras went 2 for 3 and drove in a run
Pre-Game Insights: There are no pre-game insights mentioned in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Brewers manager Pat Murphy praised the team's resilience and ability to post and compete
Giants manager Bob Melvin acknowledged that the team had a poor game overall
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Giants went 2-4 on a six-game trip and fell below.500
The Brewers are 9 1/2 games ahead of the Chicago Cubs for the biggest division lead in the majors
Others: Aaron Civale worked seven innings for his longest outing of the season
He struck out seven while allowing only two hits and two walks in his third quality start in his last four outings
